quizDescription: Test your knowledge of rock 'n' roll legends and iconic bands with this music quiz.

questions.question: Which rock band is known for their hit songs 'Bohemian Rhapsody' and 'We Will Rock You'?
questions.explanation: Queen, led by Freddie Mercury, is famous for their iconic songs like 'Bohemian Rhapsody' and 'We Will Rock You.'

questions.question: Who is often referred to as the 'King of Rock 'n' Roll'?
questions.explanation: Elvis Presley is commonly known as the 'King of Rock 'n' Roll' for his influence on the genre.

questions.question: Which rock band released the legendary album 'The Dark Side of the Moon'?
questions.explanation: Pink Floyd's 'The Dark Side of the Moon' is considered one of the greatest rock albums of all time.

questions.question: What instrument did Jimi Hendrix famously play?
questions.explanation: Jimi Hendrix was an iconic guitarist known for his groundbreaking guitar-playing skills.

questions.question: Which female rock artist released the album 'Jagged Little Pill' in the 1990s?
questions.explanation: Alanis Morissette gained fame with her album 'Jagged Little Pill,' featuring hits like 'You Oughta Know.'
